definition: Services provided by hotel staff to guests during their stay, including room maintenance, meals, and assistance.

positive_examples: The front desk clerk helped us check into our suite on the third floor.
Room service delivered our breakfast at exactly 8 AM as requested.
Housekeeping had already cleaned our room and turned down the beds when we returned.
I requested a wake-up call for 6:30 AM before my early flight.
The concierge arranged transportation to the airport for our checkout.
They brought fresh towels and restocked the minibar during turndown service.
negative_examples: The restaurant down the street serves excellent Italian food.
My car mechanic provided outstanding repair service last week.
The airline's customer service helped reschedule my cancelled flight.
We hired a cleaning service to deep clean our house monthly.
The hospital's emergency room provides 24-hour medical care.
Amazon's delivery service brought my package within two days.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: MedicalServices, AutomotiveServices, RestaurantServices, ConsultingServices
